Key Match Events: South Africa beat Australia by 134 runs
Steven Smith given out lbw on review - batter felt ball was missing leg stump
Marcus Stoinis given out caught behind on review but ball appeared to flick glove that was off the bat
Miscellaneous Highlights: Australia bowled out for 177 to lose by 134 runs - heaviest World Cup defeat by runs
Others: The match was played in Lucknow, India
